goal.ch: 本課程旨在讓課堂上的學生具備人工智慧(Artificial Intelligence, AI) 和機器學習(Machine Learning, ML) 及其智慧型系統(Intelligent Systems)的基礎知識和洞察力。 主題將包括: 類神經網絡、模糊理論、機器學習方法、機器學習過程、機器學習的應用等等。
goal.en: This course is designed for the students in the class to have fundamental knowledge and insight  of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML)  and their intelligent systems. Topics will include neural networks, fuzzy theory, machine-learning methods, learning process, machine learning based applications, and others.

outline.ch:
Topics:
•Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) and Machine Learning (M.L.) [An Overview] 人工智慧與機器學習簡論
•Basics of Neurons and Neural Networks 類神經網路基礎
•Backpropagation (BP) Learning for Deep Neural Networks 反向傳播機器學習
•Fuzzy Sets, Fuzzy Inference, and Fuzzy Systems 模糊集、模糊推理、模糊系統
•Performance Optimization for Machine Learning 機器學習之效能優化
•Least Squares 最小平方法
•Metaheuristic Machine Learning (optional) 機器學習的啟發式演算法(optional)
•Neural Fuzzy Systems and Hybrid Machine Learning 類神經模糊系統與混合式機器學習
•Advanced Topics on A.I. and M.L., (optional)
(such as Function Approximation, Data-Driven Prediction, Nature Inspired Optimization, Generalization of Machine Learning, Fuzzy-Based Clustering, Input Space Partition, Complex Neuro-Fuzzy, and more … .)
outline.en:
Topics:
•Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) and Machine Learning (M.L.) [An Overview] 人工智慧與機器學習簡論
•Basics of Neurons and Neural Networks 類神經網路基礎
•Backpropagation (BP) Learning for Deep Neural Networks 反向傳播機器學習
•Fuzzy Sets, Fuzzy Inference, and Fuzzy Systems 模糊集、模糊推理、模糊系統
•Performance Optimization for Machine Learning 機器學習之效能優化
•Least Squares 最小平方法
•Metaheuristic Machine Learning (optional) 機器學習的啟發式演算法(optional)
•Neural Fuzzy Systems and Hybrid Machine Learning 類神經模糊系統與混合式機器學習
•Advanced Topics on A.I. and M.L., (optional)
(such as Function Approximation, Data-Driven Prediction, Nature Inspired Optimization, Generalization of Machine Learning, Fuzzy-Based Clustering, Input Space Partition, Complex Neuro-Fuzzy, and more … .)

textbook.ch:
Textbook:  None.

Reference books: 
1.Martin T. Hagan, Howard B. Demuth, Mark H. Beale and Orlando D. Jesús, Neural Network Design, 2nd Edition, 2014. 
2.J.-S. R. Jang, C.-T. Sun and E. Mizutani, Neuro-Fuzzy and Soft Computing, PEARSON, 2004. 
3.G. J. Klir and B. Yuan, Fuzzy Sets and Fuzzy Logic, Prentice Hall, 1995.
4.R. Eberhart, Y.Shi, and J. Kennedy, Swarm Intelligence. San Mateo, CA: Morgan Kaufmann, 2001.
5.M. Dorigo and T. Stutzle, Ant Colony Optimization. Cambridge, MA: MIT Press, 2004.
6.Z. Michalewicz, Genetic Algorithms + Data Structures = Evolution Programs, 3rd Ed., Springer, 1999. 
7.S. Haykin, Neural Networks, 2nd Ed., Prentice Hall, 1999.
8.B. Widrow and S. D. Stearns, Adaptive Signal Processing, Prentice Hall 1985.
9.S. Russell and P. Norvig, Artificial Intelligence – A Modern Approach, 3rd ed., Pearson Education, NJ, USA, 2010. 
10.Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio and Aaron Courville, Deep Learning, the MIT Press, 2016.
11.Gareth Williams, Linear Algebra with Applications, 9th Ed., Jones ＆ Bartlett Learning, Burlington, MA, USA, 2017.
12.David R. Anderson, Dennis J. Sweeney and Thomas A. Williams, Statistics for Business and Economics, 11th ed., South-Western Cengage Learning, Ohio, USA, 2011.

gradMethod.ch:
1) 作業(Homeworks)                                 60％
2) 期中評量(Mid-term evaluation)            15％
3) 期末評量(Final evaluation)                  15％
4) 課堂出席及參與 (Attendance ＆ participation) 10％
-------------------------------------
5) 學期專題 (Term project) (加分選項; 自由選擇參與)                     10％
------------------------------------
gradMethod.en:
1) Homeworks                                           60％
2) Mid-term evaluation                              15％
3) Final evaluation                                   15％
4) Attendance ＆ participation                   10％
-------------------------------------
5) Term project  (bonus option; free choice to participation)                       10％
------------------------------------

flexDiscription.ch:
前16週, 一般正常教學。
最後2週, 研討及主題教學。
flexDiscription.en: 16 weeks of regular teaching, followed by 2 weeks of seminars and topic teaching.
